text: The 2017–18 FC Augsburg season was the 111th season in the football club's history. The season lasted from 1 July 2017 to 30 June 2018. ==Players== ===Squad information=== ==Competitions== ===Overview=== ===Bundesliga=== ====League table==== ====Results summary==== ====Results by round==== ====Matches==== ===DFB-Pokal=== ==References== Category:FC Augsburg seasons Category:2017 in association football Category:2018 in association football Category:Football in Germany
